channel.title: Adding a shop to a 700+
channel.description:
hello this is my first tutorial so it might be a bit hard to follow but it is a very very simple guide to creating a shop on a 700+. first go to NPCHandler.java and find else if (npc.getId() == 11270) ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 19);
then copy that and paste undneath it. then where it says (npc.getId() == 11270) change the 11270 to the npc id. and also at the bottom where it says (player, 19); change the 19 to the number of the shop which we will come back to.
then go to data/item and delete packedshops.s then open up unpackedshops.s at the bottom place this under the last shop 22 995 false - zeke's wepon store - change the 22 to the shop number which you then need to go back to the npchander and place the number you put into unpackedshops.txt into the place where i told you then save and exit. also change the zeke's wepon store to what you want to name the shop then fill in the shops id's like the rest. then you need to go to data/npc then make a copy of your packedspawn file as you will need to copy files after. after you have made a copy of that delete it. after go to unpackedspawnlist.txt and then fill in the npc id and coords like this 683 - 3090 3497 0 then when you have done that you then need to start the server then turn it of so that a new packedspawns file is there and then you need to go into the copy of your packedspawns and copy it all then go into the packedspawns being used and paste into the then you should have everything done with working shops.
sorry if there is to much writing in as this is my first tut and im not very good lol hope this has helped you on your ways.

item.title: Adding a shop to a 700+

item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

shabba 56:

World.spawnNPC(554, new WorldTile(3091, 3502, 0), -1, true, true);

Why would you hardcode every npc in when there is already a was of packing them?

Read full topic

item.title: Adding a shop to a 700+
item.dc:creator: @shabba_56 shabba 56
item.description:
@shabba_56 wrote:

download these to java files add them to utils found src>com>rs>utils

1> http://www.upload.ee/files/2187913/FileUtilities.java.html
2> http://www.upload.ee/files/2187914/NPCSpawning.java.html

then go to launch.java and add this import

import com.rs.utils.NPCSpawning;

then search for

ServerChannelHandler.init();

under it add this code

NPCSpawning.spawnNPCS();

file save

in npcspawning.java file u will see this code

World.spawnNPC(554, new WorldTile(3091, 3502, 0), -1, true, true);

554 = npc id
3091 = x coords
3502 = y coords
0 = npc hight you dont change it and true is weather u want the npc to move or not

now u have added a new npc time to make the shop interface

first go to NPCHandler.java and search for

else if (npc.getId() == 11270)
ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 19);

copy it and past it under it NOTE: 11270 is the npc id and 19 is the shop change the 19 to 22 since there are 21 shops already change the npc id to the one u have just made in npcspawning then save and exit

last part go to data>items folder delete packedShops.s and open up unpackedShops.txt

u see the numbers down the side going from 1 to 21 make a new shop with the next number 22 995 is the shop currency = $ and then shop name then item id then stock amount save and exit then compile and run new shop and npc

Read full topic

item.title: Adding a shop to a 700+
item.dc:creator: @Tragic-Pkz Tragic-Pkz
item.description:
@Tragic-Pkz wrote:

hello this is my first tutorial so it might be a bit hard to follow but it is a very very simple guide to creating a shop on a 700+.
first go to NPCHandler.java and find
else if (npc.getId() == 11270)
ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 19);

then copy that and paste undneath it. then where it says (npc.getId() == 11270) change the 11270 to the npc id.
and also at the bottom where it says (player, 19); change the 19 to the number of the shop which we will come back to.

then go to data/item and delete packedshops.s then open up unpackedshops.s at the bottom place this under the last shop
22 995 false - zekeâ€™s wepon store -
change the 22 to the shop number which you then need to go back to the npchander and place the number you put into unpackedshops.txt into the place where i told you then save and exit.
also change the zekeâ€™s wepon store to what you want to name the shop then fill in the shops idâ€™s like the rest.
then you need to go to data/npc then make a copy of your packedspawn file as you will need to copy files after.
after you have made a copy of that delete it.
after go to unpackedspawnlist.txt and then fill in the npc id and coords like this 683 - 3090 3497 0
then when you have done that you then need to start the server then turn it of so that a new packedspawns file is there and then you need to go into the copy of your packedspawns and copy it all then go into the packedspawns being used and paste into the then you should have everything done with working shops.

                                       sorry if there is to much writing in as this is my first tut and im not very good lol

hope this has helped you on your ways.
